Title: Radiant Burst
Feature: A burst of light that deals radiant damage to enemies in the area.

Title: Sunbeam
Feature: Deals radiant damage to a single target over time.

Title: Blinding Flash
Feature: Blinds enemies in the area, reducing their accuracy.

Title: Blinding Ray
Feature: Shoots a concentrated beam of light, causing blindness to enemies in its path.

Title: Solar Flare
Feature: Unleashes a devastating beam of light that burns all enemies in its radius.
